text: Metta is a Buddhist term translated as loving kindness or friendliness. Metta is wanting others to be happy. The opposite is wanting others to be unhappy: anger, hatred. ==Related pages== * Meditation == Other websites == * The Path of Unlimited Friendliness - a translation of the Karaniya Metta Sutta by Dharmachari Ratnaprabha Category:Buddhist terminology
